attributes.action: Expand the Metro train lines to the southern parts of Northumberland
attributes.background: I believe it may be a good idea to expand the Metro train lines to the Southern parts of Northumberland such as Cramlington, Ashington, Bedlington, Blyth and Ponteland etc. because it will be able to provide another way of access to the big cities such as Newcastle and Sunderland.

rejection.details:
The Metro system is run by Nexus, which is the responsibility of the North East Combined Authority (neca). You can find out how to contact them here:

https://www.northeastca.gov.uk/contact-us
